testcase.name: Products check
testcase.system-out: Given user visit https://checkout.pod-point.com/............................passed And user select Mitsubishi and Outlander in the Select Your Car fields......passed And user check the box ‘I am NOT eligible to claim the dealership discount as I did not come through a dedicated dealership’.passed When user select the ‘Universal Socket’ option..............................passed And user select power rating................................................passed And user check the prices for the 7kw unit displayed match the following values £879 Full Price and £529 With OLEV Grant.passed And user check that 6 compatible extras are shown...........................passed And user select a random compatible extra...................................passed Then the total price at the bottom right of the screen should correctly match the 7kw unit price + the compatible extra price.passed
